properties.areaDesc: Flat Tops; Elkhead and Park Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 2:12PM MST until January 3 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 18
inches with locally higher amounts above 9000 feet. Winds could
gust as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday...New Years Day...to midnight MST
Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible,
especially over mountain passes. Patchy blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A
detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY...NEW YEARS DAY...TO MIDNIGHT MST THURSDAY NIGHT
